snippet: The British bank is requiring contractors in its investment business to take a 10 percent cut and unpaid leave as it tries to shave annual costs by $5 billion.

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas

lead_paragraph: The British bank is requiring contractors in its investment business to take a 10 percent cut and unpaid leave as it tries to shave annual costs by $5 billion.

headline.main: HSBC Reducing Pay for Contractors in Cost-Cutting Push
